segments.text: Why don't you begin by telling me something about yourself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you want to know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The usual , you know , something about your background and experience and anything personal that you feel is pertinent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I was born in Shanghai and went to school there , right up through college . My father is a lawyer , and my mother is a teacher .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds as if you come from a professional family .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That right . One of my sisters is a doctor and the other one teaches at a university .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What made you decide to get into computers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , nothing in particular , I guess . I always liked mathematics and tinkering with machines .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now what about your experience ? How long have you been working with computers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: More than five years now . After I did my engineering degree , I began to specialize in computer technology and I even had my own company for a while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It certainly sounds impressive . Why don't you have your credentials sent to me and I'll show them to the board ? We'll probably get back to you in a week .
segments.speaker: S1
